name: Hexamory System: Courage
description:
Gross Summary:

Explore an unknown system of a barren Earth and find what happened to it. Play games and solve puzzles to find clues leading to your objective.

Gameplay:

There are six games with a dozen levels each:

  • Byter: This is basically a Snake-clone.
  • Defreezer: Pass through labyrinths of ice to get to the "Defreezer" and complete the game.
  • Decrypter: Reproduce the sign on the right as many times as asked. You may rotate or change pieces at will.
  • Decoder: On a fairly big grid of numbers, get the demanded number as well as the requested shape of the code. [TAB Key to validate.]
  • Wallbreaker: This is a shooter game where you have to break a wall after cleaning the screen from enemies.
  • Word Jacker: Find the password from the hints given on the screen.

Completing a game will unlock the adjacent ones, and once an hexagon is complete, the corresponding entry will unlock itself. Don't forget to scan (right click) everything you find, if you get lost in the game.

Controls:

Left Click / Enter Key: Confirm.

Right Click: Scan or Cancel choice.

Wheel (Up/Down): Zoom in/out (respectively.)

ESC Key: Escape Pause/Menus.

Directional Arrows: Select options (can also be done by hovering over concerned objects.)

Credits:
David Peck for the soundtrack.
